All known proofs of this theorem are topological. We present a geometric version of a recent beautiful proof by BlagojeviA double dagger, Matschke, and Ziegler, avoiding a direct use of topological methods. The purpose of this de-topologization is to make the proof more concrete and intuitive, and accessible to a wider audience.
